messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] How can I let go. . .
messages.msgSnippet: unschoolingbasicsPossibly because she is talking through her hat. She likely hasn t met that many hsers entering 7th grade and the story about the 1 or 2 she
messages.messageBody:
unschoolingbasicsPossibly because she is talking through her hat. She likely hasn't met that many hsers entering 7th grade and the story about the 1 or 2 she has met has expanded to cover all hsers.

And who gives a rat's patootie anyway?

My kids handwriting is OK, I guess. Mine is horrible.

But their keyboarding skills are terrific!

Welcome to 2007! Geesh. . .

Nance


(Actually, she was moved to inform me that all homeschoolers who come
to her school in 7th grade have "atrocious" handwriting. I just smiled
at my son and said, "Our favorite subject, right?" NOT!)

How did she think saying that would be helpful in any way? Why say it?



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
